name: Scraze
description:
Our Scribblo wakes up in a strange labyrinth, now knowing where to go or what to expect. He doesn't understand the language of the lands, can you guide him to the end? 

Be careful, the light grows dimmer as you reach deeper and deeper...

Notes: Read the hints well, and try to decipher what they mean, it will be really helpful. Move with the arrow keys and try to find the end of each level.

Created by Pfolch97, omt97 and BishopBit.

Submission to "Scribble Jam". The jam had these themes/challenges:

  • Theme: Scribble / Doodle 
  • Challange: All text in your game must be a made up language
